summary.span: 代表 值集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的成員的行為完全如所述， ，並文件，不同之處在於此實作會擲回如果您嘗試插入`null`至集合。Members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation, except that this implementation throws an if you attempt to insert `null` into the collection. **Freezable 功能：** 因為它繼承自類別類別會提供數個特殊功能：物件可以宣告為唯讀以改善所做的多個物件之間共用效能、 複製，並變更為安全執行緒。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 如需詳細資訊，所提供的不同功能的相關物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreKInt32Values**oneOrMoreKInt32Values* 一或多個與單一逗點和/或一個或多個空格來分隔每個成對的值：One or more values, with each pair delimited by a single comma and/or one or more spaces: *[delimeter* *]\** *[delimeter* *]\** 例如，`"5 10 43"`和`"5,10,43"`都有效。For example, `"5 10 43"` and `"5,10,43"` are both valid.

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽的強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .
